resources.string: The M-Search team utilizes an international database matching system that ranks medicine matches in terms of closeness to the original medicine and in accordance to medication matching guidelines. We utilize these databases specifically to match on active ingredients and rank further based on intake method and dosage amounts. This helps the team ensure the best results of equivalency at the top of our program to help you quickly find what you are looking for.
The results are labeled by their brand name and are sorted by relevancy. In order to obtain more information about each result tap the respective item
The ndc number on the packaging might contain 3 numbers. Please only include the first 2. For example if the packaging says 0069–1085–30 please only include 0069–1085
The easy way to identify medicinal alternatives!
Please select which mode you want to use to identify your medication
Please enter the 2 numbers of the ndc code as indicated on the packaging separated by the hyphen
Please select the initial country the medication is coming from and the country you want to search for alternatives in.
